name: INMessage
desc: Information about a message that your app sends or receives.

items.name: init(identifier: String, conversationIdentifier: String?, content: String?, dateSent: Date?, sender: INPerson?, recipients: [INPerson]?, messageType: INMessageType)
items.desc: Initializes a message object with the specified unique identifier and content.

items.name: init(identifier: String, conversationIdentifier: String?, content: String?, dateSent: Date?, sender: INPerson?, recipients: [INPerson]?, groupName: INSpeakableString?, messageType: INMessageType)
items.desc: Initializes a message object with the specified unique identifier and content.

items.name: init(identifier: String, content: String?, dateSent: Date?, sender: INPerson?, recipients: [INPerson]?)
items.desc: Initializes a message object with the specified unique identifier and content.

items.name: init(identifier: String, conversationIdentifier: String?, content: String?, dateSent: Date?, sender: INPerson?, recipients: [INPerson]?, groupName: INSpeakableString?, messageType: INMessageType, serviceName: String?)
items.desc: Initializes a message object with the specified unique identifier and content.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The app-specific unique identifier for the message.

items.name: var conversationIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier associated with the conversation.

items.name: var messageType: INMessageType
items.desc: The type of content contained in the message.

items.name: enum INMessageType
items.desc: Constants indicating the type of content contained in a message.

items.name: var sender: INPerson?
items.desc: The user that sent the message.

items.name: var recipients: [INPerson]?
items.desc: The users that received the message.

items.name: var groupName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The name of the group associated with the message.

items.name: var dateSent: Date?
items.desc: The date the sender sent the message.

items.name: var serviceName: String?
items.desc: The service used to send the message.
